column5: UNOBSTRUCTED VIEWS OF DALLAS SKYLINE FROM YOUR PRIVATE ROOFTOP DECK! Stunning 3 bed, 3 bath home with tons of designer touches! Updated kitchen boasts SS appliances, mosaic tile backsplash, gas stove & pendant lighting! Owner''s suite features spa inspired bath - soaking tub, walk in closet & separate shower! 1st Floor Bedroom w En Suite Bath! Minutes from Downtown. Imagine evenings spent entertaining on the rooftop deck with million dollar views!
